sourceDesc.p: A TEI file created from Ethio-SPaRe data

revisionDesc.change: transformed from mycore to TEI P5

place.settlement: wäräda Dägʿa Tämben, ṭabiya Särät, qušät ʾƎnda Maryam Qorrar

note.desc: During the reign of King ʿAmdä Ṣǝyon I (r. 1314-44).
note.ab: Gädam. At least 25 monks live in the community; there is a well-established church school. A more recent church dedicated to Täklä Haymanot, associated with the monastery, is located in the vicinity. Tabots (6?): Mary Zion (?), Kidanä Mǝḥrät, Iyäsus, Four Living Creatures, George, separately one tabot of ʿAbiyä ʾƎgziʾ was mentioned.
